documents.document:
Honeymoon In Kerala – Explore Its Beaches and Backwaters

Kerala is a beautiful state which is located on the southern tip of the India. This charming state is very famous for its natural beauties which are simply a god gifted for the state of Kerala and is lovingly known as God’s Own Country. This beautiful state is very famous for its pristine clear beaches and backwaters. These attractions are sheer wonder and truly cast a magic on the visitor’s heart on their visit to this awe-inspiring state of India. Kerala is situated on the Shore of the gorgeous Arabian Sea and it stretches of 600 km along the India South West coasts offer the state channels of backwaters, rivers, beaches, lakes etc. These truly attract the honeymooners and the other visitors to this beautiful state.

Mostly the honeymooners on their Kerala honeymoon tours from around the world come to visit and explore the natural attractions of Kerala that is the beaches and the backwaters. Some of the famous backwaters and beaches in Kerala are as listed below:

Kovalam
Kovalam is one of the most beautiful beach resorts in the world and is located in the Kerala only 18 km away from the capital city of Kerala that is Tiruvandrum. Any visitors on their Kerala tour is easily entice by its azure water, lovely gleaming sands and the swaying palm trees attracts the visitors and the honeymooners for their memorable vacations ever. Kovalam has three beaches which crescent to each other and are named as the Hawa, Samudra and the Light house beach.

Cherai Beach
Cherai beach is one of the most beautiful beaches in Kerala. This beach is located here on the northern border of Vypeen Island and is located 26 Km far away from the Ernakulam city, Kochi. This one of the clean beaches and is ideal for swimming, sunbath and fishing and it stretches around 15km long. The visitors if can occasionally have the glimpse of Dolphins as they spring out and dive back into water and the far end of the beach is lined with Chinese fishing nets which also attracts the visitors.

Alleppey Backwater
Alleppey is very famous city and is very renowned for its backwater destination. As Kerala is mostly famous for the backwaters so is Alleppey is very famous for its backwater and the cruise on the houseboats. Honeymoon in Kerala is not very worthy until the couple’s sails on the houseboats which cruises over the tranquil backwater of the Alleppey lovingly called as the Venice of East. The house boats sails along the beautiful nature, calm palm dotted trees, lush paddy fields and many alike truly seduces the mood of the couples and take them to the new world of serenity. Apart from these attractions this sleepy city is also have a beach and which is also mostly visited by the visitors.

Well, on your Kerala honeymoon tour you also can experience the joy as there are more famous backwater destinations and gorgeous beaches which are very stunning and they are as the Kumarakom backwater, Kuttanad backwater, Bypore beach, Fort Kochi Beach and Bekal Beach.

So, plan a Kerala honeymoon package and tour Kerala this will really give you a wonderful joy and bagful memories which will mesmerize your heart till eternity with lovely memories.

Munnar Honeymoon the Likes of Most Couples On Kerala Honeymo


The word honeymoon brings love, romance and a beautiful destination in the mind of couples as they hear and plan for this auspicious occasion. Honeymoon is the most awaited moment for every one in their life. Honeymoon is celebrated with great enthusiast and love in a beautiful destination and this particular occasion of honeymoon is the first time when couples are out together for some time. Couple’s from every nook and corner of the world flood to Kerala to enjoy their romantic occasion of honeymoon in Mother Nature is abundant. This beautiful state is one of the famous and become a hotspot for the honeymooners.

This state in South India is situated on the edge of the elegant Arabian Sea and is bounded on other side by the mighty green verdant hills of Western Ghats. Kerala is dotted with beautiful attractions which are manmade and natural and which truly entice the couple’s lot on their honeymoon Kerala tour.

Kerala has many awe inspiring destinations which truly elates the heart and soul of the honeymooners among them Munnar the picturesque hill station tops the list. Munnar is located on the elevations of 1600 meter above the main sea level and is heralded as the Kashmir of South. The soothing cool climatic conditions and the plentiful lush nature truly attract the honeymooners from the entire world. This hill town is situated at the confluence of the three mountain streams Mudrapuzha, Kundala and Nallathani which offers the hill station of a picturesque view of the entire hill town.

Mostly the couples on their Munnar honeymoon packages book a colonial resorts and bungalows and spend some time of intimacy which offers them a lifetime affair for the couples. The honeymooners fall in love forever as they stroll along the sprawling tea gardens, aromatic spice and coffee plantations. The Kashmir of South refreshes the mind of the couples with romance and love forever. The newlywed couple’s heads are in clouds as they see the mist filled valley, clouds touching the green rolling mountains and the exotic flora on their Kerala honeymoon.

Well these are not only the attractions which will mesmerize you forever apart from these there are many more beautiful attractions like the cascading waterfalls, wildlife parks and the placid lakes will truly leave you spell bound on your honeymoon visits.

Apart from these Kerala is very famous for its backwater and beaches and which is must see and explore attractions with any Kerala honeymoon packages planned from any leading Kerala tour operators. The backwaters tour is very famous among the honeymooners as they love to sail in the well organized houseboats along the beautiful nature which truly seduces there moods and these attractions truly take them to the world of serenity where romance and love are in abundant. The Beach honeymoon in kerala is very much love by the couples as the love to spend their fun filled vacations. The Kovalam beach is very stunning and this destination is love at first sight destination for the couples.

So come to Kerala for your auspicious honeymoon where love and romance flows in every air here. <br><br>

Kerala Blissful Ambiance Will Leave You Spell Bound


Kerala the internationally known state of India is blessed with inviting beauty and attractions that are one of its kinds in the whole world. It is amazingly beautiful and has host of tourism within its proximity that invites tourists from all over the world to let them experience and feel the magic of the nature at its best. Its enigmatic beauty of the backwaters, hill stations, fascinating wildlife parks and sanctuaries and on top the rich culture and traditions combine together to make Kerala an ideal holiday destinations for all vacation be it leisure, fun-filled family vacations or on top special holidays like honeymoon.

Kerala today is one of the hot spot for holidays and is one of the most visited states by the tourist in compared to other tourism state of India. On Kerala travel one can see and explore some of the charming and fascinating tourism attractions that depicts the magical beauty and wonder of the state that has made Kerala internationally popular. Some of the worth to visit and see attractions in this heavenly state Kerala is in good number and among all some of them is Munnar Hill Station, Alleppey and Kumarakom backwaters, Thekkady and Periyar wildlife sanctuary, Thrissur, Trivandrum and Kochi. More of all these places of Kerala are amazingly blessed with the scintillating beauty of the nature and sightseeing places that truly feast the eyes with different vistas, making Kerala travels and experince to treasure and cherish.

Apart from leisure holidays of family vacations, Kerala in India is also the hot spot for honeymoon holidays. Honeymoon holidays Kerala is an ultimate experience and so is the reason that newly weds from across the nook and corner of the world come to this beautiful state to celebrate once in a lifetime vacations in the most cherished way. The blissful ambiance the romantic places is surely going to make the honeymoon in Kerala an experience to treasure and cherish for a long time to go.

Well be it honeymoon or holidays with families and friends, Kerala is surely going to cater your needs and preferences to make your holidays truly the most cherished vacation of lifetime. So welcome to this incredible Kerala – the God’s Own Country.

Honeymoon in Kerala and its Startling Beaches and Backwaters

‘Honeymoon’ the word itself brings full of romance and rejoice in every minds of couples. The newly married couples want to select the best place for their honeymoon as this is the time of excitement, romance and leisure for them. Choosing the right destination the couples love to choose the place where luxury, privacy and security are abundant. The beautiful world has many attractive and captivating destinations which are very ideal for the occasion of honeymoon.

Couples from entire world are finding the Kerala in India the most romantic and very ideal for honeymoon. This beautiful state in India is become hot spot for the honeymooners as they find everything romantic and full of love here. Kerala in India is speckled with romantic destinations and lovely picturesque attractions which lure the honeymooners from every nook and corner of the world. Truly speaking one of the best places for your honeymoon is the scintillating Kerala.
This beautiful state in India offers wide range of attractions which is truly out of this world and magnetizing.

From the stunning beaches and the sands to the green rolling hills, from the fresh tea plantations on the hills to the lush green paddy fields below the sea level is truly wonder and amazing and out of this world. The couples want their honeymoon tour to be memorable moment which should always remain in their heart till eternity. So, I honestly believe if you want this moment to be cherished and always remembered throughout your life then come to Kerala, the paradise for the newly married couples.

So, contact a proficient Kerala tour operator who offers you tailor-made Kerala honeymoon packages which will offer both of you a delightful honeymoon and which is going to leave you along with your beloved in pink of health.

The destinations and attractions which will leave you spell bound on your visit on your Kerala honeymoon are in myriad and truly hypnotize you with your beloved. Kovalam beach is one of the most famous beaches resort in the world the couples love to relax under the shadows of swaying palm trees and enjoy the sun bask on the golden sands. Apart from these there are many picturesque beaches like Alappuzha Beach, Fort Kochi beach and the Varkala beach. The couples enjoy lying down on the glistering sands and so get tanned.

Then the backwater cruise takes the couples to world of serenity where love and romance can be felt in every air of it. The journey on the houseboat offers the couple time of intimacy and this really seduce the mood of the newly married couples. Some of the startling backwaters destinations are Kuttanad, Vembanad, Alleppey and Kumarakom. The houseboat journey through these pristine clear backwaters adds shimmer on your Kerala honeymoon. Some special packages are also arranged by leading tour operators for honeymoon in kerala backwaters.

Apart from these Kerala honeymoon also offer other attractions which are absolutely out of this world and very enticing that glows love and romance. Kerala will truly offer you golden bagful memories which keep mesmerizing you with your beloved till eternity.

Step Into Kerala Tours and Explore the Splendor of Green Par

After a hectic schedule of life every one wishes to look for good tourism destinations where any one can spare a good time of intimacy with their family and lovable one. Despite knowing the fact that, this world is blessed with several attractions and wonderments but none is equally magnificent like Kerala which is fondly referred as ‘God’s own country’ nestled in south-western region of India. This is the world’s best place for vacationers, honeymooners, nature-lovers, and adventure seekers. Due to its magnificent attractions and wonderments tourists visit to this place from across the world all the year round. If you wish to spare your holidays in the lap of Mother Nature then visit to this place once which will surely make you journey remarkable and memorable.

This beautiful state is blessed with unmatched attractions of nature including sparkling backwater sites, captivating hill stations, exotic wildlife sanctuaries, pristine beach sites and varied species of flora and fauna which you can experience during kerala tours. Apart from its attractions and wonderments, Kerala is sacred with various ancient temples which are an important part of Keralan culture. The temples of this state are dedicated to various gods and goddess from the Hindu mythology. Architectural delights, these temples are carved in the traditional style. This state is well established and offers all the top class facilities to their tourists. Besides, the resilient people with smiling faces of Kerala fascinate the tourists.

Due its magnificent attractions and wonderments Kerala has become the honeymooner’s hub. With the intention to celebrate their auspicious occasion, honeymooners visit to this place from across the world all the year round. During Kerala Honeymoon Tours newly wed people prefer to go to the hill stations and backwater destinations of this state which are extremely beautiful. Hill stations of Kerala spotted with lush green valleys, dense forest, cascading waterfalls, varied spice plantations and many alike. Hill stations of this state are very cool which adds the pleasure among honeymooners. Visit to these hill satiations is equal to discover the paradise on earth which makes any one will fall in love with them. Munnar, Thekkady, Idukki, Kottayam, and Kochi and many alike are the beautiful and salubrious hill stations of Kerala where you can visit during your tour. While touring to these hill stations you will have the great opportunity of some adventurous activities such as mountaineering, climbing at rugged hills and many alike.

Apart from, backwater destinations of this state are very popular which are exclusive and have their own charm. These backwaters are the perfect combination of brackish lagoons, lakes, inlets and many rivers which forms the brilliant surroundings that you can experience through mobile homes of houseboats. These houseboats are well organized and offer all the luxury facilities to the vacationers which takes them though the perfect natural pass. Cochin, Alappuzha, and Kumarakom are some of the magnificent backwater destinations where you can take your family and beloved one. Besides Thiruvananthapuram, Kottayam, Kovalam, Wayanad are some of the beautiful attraction sites of this state where you can visit through kerala tour packages.

Kerala Honeymoon - Bliss For the Honeymooners

Honeymooners from every nook and corner of the world teem to this wonderful state in India for their honeymoon celebration and to take back the billion golden memories which can be treasured for ever. This state is wonderment and is truly one of the most beautiful places in India for the honeymooners. The honeymooners abroad the country and from the home comes in number to visit this land of wonders. The cherry amiable climate conditions and the bounteous lovely and natural attractions attract the honeymooners. The couples visit this beautiful state of Kerala which is located in the southern tip of India and is elegantly located on the shore of the gorgeous Arabian Sea.

Kerala is truly become a hot spot for the newlywed couples and this state truly has everything as for the honeymooners. Romantic destinations, privacy and security is loved by the almost all the honeymooners and this really is available here with the beautiful surroundings.

Some of the famous attractions and the breath taking destinations which is visited by the newly wed couples on their honeymoon in kerala are listed below:

Alleppey
This is the most scenic town in the Alappuzha district and is very famous for the backwater site. This village is amazingly outstanding and thus the honeymooners are teemed here throughout the year. The couples love to visit this place as they enjoy the joy ride on the well organized houseboat which offers them a journey to heaven through a beautiful nature which takes them to the world of serenity. Honeymoon Kerala is never going to be completed until you enjoy the scenic houseboat cruise which offer the couples solitude moment and enjoy some time of intimacy together.

Thekkady
Thekkady is one of the most popular destinations and the honeymooners flee to this place in intense number. If you want some adventure and you would love your beholder to be in your arm then take a walk along the expert guide and enjoy some exotic wild life. Scintillating views, picturesque landscapes, natural endowments and the indigenous animal and their astonishing move in their natural Kingdom, these all are enjoyed very much by the couples.

Munnar
This is the most beautiful hill stations in the world. Elegantly located at the elevations of 1500 meter above the sea level is one of the most sought after honeymoon destinations with any Kerala honeymoon packages planned from a leading Kerala honeymoon tour operator. The picturesque landscapes, lush meadows, green vegetations, well organized tea and coffee plantations truly are sheer wonder and are truly amazing. The honeymooners love to stay in the tree house and lovely colonial resorts as on there honeymoon visit to Munnar, they get chance to enjoy some intimacy of time together, which offer them a lifetime affair.

There are many attractions and evergreen destinations which will bring golden memories to your beloved and yours heart which can be cherished till eternity on your honeymoon Kerala. So do not wait for too long get contact a leading honeymoon tour operator and be here in Kerala for your honeymoon occasion which comes around once in lifetime.

Kerala Honeymoon Ideal Place to Know Each Other in a Better

Looking for a romantic gateway in India? Come to Kerala the state in south India where nature has pour all its expressions, beauty and splendor to its perfection.

Kerala is the one of the most sought after holiday destinations and no wonder due to its pleasant climatic conditions, scintillating surrounding the range of exotic destinations ideal for honeymoon holidays, Kerala has fastly emerging as the hot pick among the newly weds.

The state is gifted with amazing tourism attractions and well organised facilities that add cherry on a cake for the honeymooners. World class accommodation facilities offered by the beach resort and hotels, excellent services, romantic setting for the honeymooners and the warm and welcoming hospitality truly hold over the heart of the honeymooners and let them enjoy private moments of sheer pleasure in true comfort and luxury.

Beside these kerala honeymoon is made more romantic and enjoyable by the ideal honeymoon destinations like Munnar lovingly called Kashmir of the South, backwaters of Alleppey, Kumarakom and Kuttanad where newly wed couples can leisure cruise enjoying the traditional beauty of the houseboat and the scintillating beauty with which the backwater are adorned with. Truly Kerala honeymoon tours is made romantic and the most cherished one by the houseboat stay cruising over the picturesque backwaters which is one such attractions that no other tourist destinations in the world can match.

Not only that the romantic does not halt here, but goes along with you where ever you go in Kerala. More to add romance to your Kerala honeymoon packages, beaches offer the perfect setting to enjoy cherished moments being together. Hold your beloved hand and take her for a cruise along the pristine beaches sharing the moments of love and pleasure on visit to Kerala beaches.

No wonder, Kerala tourism is making great progress and so the number of visit by the honeymooners is increasing, making Kerala the perfect gateway for romantic honeymoon holidays. So hold your beloved or your princess of dream in your cozy arm along the romantic beach or in the hill stations of Kerala, the evergreen paradise is sure to make your honeymoon celebration the most outstanding holidays of lifetime.

Wish you all the best for honeymoon and a happy married life. Hope the wonderment and the beauty of Kerala work wonder to make your divine relationship stronger and happier.

Explore the Never Changing Beauty of Kerala

India has several exotic tourism destinations for vacations. Among many such destinations, Kerala is one state that most of the tourists from across the world choose to enjoy vacation, be it for honeymoon, leisure vacation or fun memorable holidays with families and friends. Blessed with extraordinary beauty and cocooned in the celestial beauty that never takes name to change even though it has been long time, the state invites tourists of all ages and walks from remote corner of the world for tours and travels.

The scintillating surrounding make Kerala not just the most frequented, but are the most enjoyed by the tourists of all ages. Either is the palm dotted backwaters or the scintillating hill stations or the beautiful beaches, the aroma and the beauty of the state penetrate so deep inside that rejuvenate your senses at all state of your Kerala tour. And now wonder, whether is the delicious and irresistible Appam and Tapioca and Fish Curry or the natural endowments, Kerala travel will fill you will with complete joy and happiness.

Due to the heavenly beauty and the natural endowments, kerala tour packages are today much in demand for its amazing backwaters, virgin beaches, cool and romantic hill stations, and the charming wildlife parks and sanctuaries. These are the main elements of Kerala tourism and no doubt tourist and the family vacationers who come from across the world enjoy to their fullest and return back home with lots of remarkable memories. So come and explore the splendor of the natural beauty which is beyond the visual and verbal descriptions.

Tourist can avail the Kerala tour packages according to their choice and budget and on top they can customize their travel packages as per their choice and needs. Kerala is truly no less then a wonder and truly its make the holidays of the tourists fun filled and memorable. Among the many tourists attractions, Kerala backwater are the top ones that lures the visitor’s hearts and fills them with true joy and happiness at the same time making the tiring soul revive enjoying the beauty of the nature.

Cruise on the picturesque backwater covering the top backwater destination like the Kollam, Kuttanad, Kumarakom, Kasargod and Kochi; explore the beauty of the nature that is so inviting that seems as if it is the best art painted by the artist on this earth. The view of the paddy fields, beautiful cascading waterfalls, gardens, villages and the spice plantation are almost feast to the eyes that most of the tourist and the nature love will love to treasure and capture for remarkable memories.

Apart from all these kerala tour also offer tourist to enjoy remarkable memories to relish in for longtime and enjoy the cherished holidays exploring the splendor of the Mother Nature, which are beyond imagination to make memorable holidays. Not only the natural endowments entice visitors but the rich culture and traditions, warm hospitality and the pleasant cool climatic conditions to make Kerala the most sought after holiday destinations in India. <br><br>

Give Your Dreams a Permanent Residence with Honeymoon in Ker

Honeymoon is a beautiful occasion which plays a dominant role in newlywed’s life as well as depicts the existence of their relationship. It comes after finishing all the marriage rituals, for every newlywed’s looks with full of enthusiasm. However no one can correlate this word only with love and romance, but their entire life depends on this beautiful occasion, when they share their likes or dislikes to each other and taking some essential steps to their further life. Every one is familiar with the magnificence of this beautiful occasion, so what you waiting just an open any travel guide and browse the best travel destinations to be visited in your lifetime occasion. Kerala also known as God’s own country one of the fifty must visit destination can well be the great start to this wonderful journey of cosmos and perhaps a surprising second honeymoon.

Due to its exceptional attractions and expressions of nature Kerala Honeymoon has become popular among newly-weds for which they visit to this beautiful place all the year round. This beautiful state is also known as green paradise which is nestling in the south-western region of India. Kerala is an ancient, besieged, holy and enchanting state which has given the rank of paradise among ten paradise of world by national geographic traveler. Once who visit to this place then he/she doesn’t have any desire to see another place. It’s really tough to exemplify the magnificence of this state in words which is worth to visit in once or a good place for starting the journey together which never makes disappoint to any one till now.

The pristine beaches, fondling sea waves, shining golden beaches, emerald coconut orchards, sleepy fishing villages and healing Ayurveda are the primary synonymous to Kerala. The king of all magnetizing features of Kerala not to be found or experience anywhere in the world. You will there plenty of things to do and to feel. Grab your beloved hand and take her for a walk by exploring the scenic vistas and experiencing the refreshing atmosphere of hill stations which will definitely leave you spellbind. honeymoon kerala takes you in the world of wonderments where the arrangements of fun and romance are served in plenty.

If you are planning to visit there now days they you must visit to the hill stations of Kerala which are quite fascinating and cool. Munnar is one of the beautiful hill station also known as Kashmir of south and of course the honeymooners paradise in real sense. This beautiful hill station is blessed with unparalleled charm including tea gardens, cascading waterfalls, wildlife reserves, lush green valleys and varied species of flora and fauna. Beside hill stations you can go the backwater sites during honeymoon in kerala which are exclusive and tremendously fascinating. These backwaters are the network of brackish lagoons, lakes, inlets, and several rivers which forms the striking depiction that one can experience with houseboats. An enchanting backwaters destination offers to the honeymooners much leisure time to share their light moments in much glorious way.

During passing through the backwaters one can experience green vegetation includes palm trees, paddy fields, and the verdant landscapes from the houseboats which are relaxing to the mind and the soul.
